channel.title: Sql Injection on Software and tech | Kristoffer Lorentsen
channel.description: Recent content in Sql Injection on Software and tech | Kristoffer Lorentsen

item.title: I just did my first SQL injection!
item.description: This week I spent a couple of hours finding my way through Norwegian Police Security Services new job application which required “hacking” to apply. See the solution on Reddit, GitHub and Kode24. I had a lot of fun trying to figure out the puzzles and it got me excited about learning more. While I liked the challenge, I do tend to like to learn in a more structured way. Enter Hacksplaining!
